msg.lootgames.puzzle_master.broken: 這個方塊好像被破壞了。請將問題發送給mod作者。
msg.lootgames.puzzle_master.turned_off: 這個結構似乎被更強的力量關閉了。
msg.lootgames.stage_complete: 這個結構似乎認可了你的努力。。。
msg.lootgames.win: 這個結構很高興，並獎勵了你！
msg.lootgames.lose: 你的失敗似乎冒犯了這個結構。
msg.lootgames.gol_master.start: 我們來玩這個遊戲吧！點擊中心的方塊！
msg.lootgames.gol_master.rules: 你只需要按順序右擊之前的顏色。
msg.lootgames.gol_master.not_ready: 你覺得這個結構現在尚未準備好應對。
msg.lootgames.gol_master.wrong_block: 看來你右擊了錯誤的顏色。。。
msg.lootgames.gol_master.reward_level_re: 目前達到的獎勵級別：%d（最佳：%d）
msg.lootgames.ms.new_attempt: 這個結構平靜下來了。你可以嘗試再玩一次。
msg.lootgames.ms.reveal_on_hidden: You can't reveal neighbours around hidden field.
msg.lootgames.ms.reveal_invalid_mark_cou: You can't reveal neighbours around this field, because it differs with flagged fields around by the number of bombs.
item.lootgames.dungeon_bricks.tooltip: Mobs can't spawn on this block.
advancement.lootgames.game_of_light.desc: Get the chance to play Game Of Light
advancement.lootgames.win.desc: 贏得一個小型遊戲並獲得成噸的戰利品
advancement.lootgames.gol.level3.desc: Beat a Game of Light at Level 3 (You still failed Level 4, soo.. try harder!)
advancement.lootgames.gol.level4.desc: Beat a Game of Light at Level 4
advancement.lootgames.minesweeper.desc: Get the chance to play Minesweeper
config.lootgames.minigamesenabled.toolti: If this is set to false, then puzzle master won't start any game.
config.lootgames.enabledebug.tooltip: If this is equal true, then it will print additional info to log files.
config.lootgames.debuglevel.tooltip: Available variants: debug, trace.\nDebug: additionally prints debug messages.\nTrace: additionally prints debug and trace messages.
config.lootgames.worldgenenabled.tooltip: If this is equal true, then dungeon generation will be enabled.
config.lootgames.retrogenenabled.tooltip: If this is equal true, then minigame dungeons will appear in already generated chunks.
config.lootgames.dimrhomblist:
Dimension and Rhomb List
config.lootgames.dimrhomblist.tooltip=Whitelisted dimensions' ids that were allowed for dungeon generation and rhomb size.
The second parameter is the size of rhombs, which will imaginary cover the world. Dungeon will be generated in each rhomb.
So the larger the size, the less chance of generation.
Example of array element: 0; 20 - this means that dungeons will be generated in rhombs with size equal to 20 in the overworld (ID = 0)
config.lootgames.common.stage.loot_table: Name of the loottable, items from which will be generated in the chest of this stage. This can be adjusted per-Dimension in Per-Dimension Config.
Minimum amount of items to be generated in chest. Won't be applied, if count of items in bound loot table are less than it. If min and max are set to -1, the limits will be disabled.
Maximum amount of items to be generated in chest. If this is set to -1, max limit will be disabled.
config.lootgames.gol.start_digits.toolti: How many digits should be randomly chosen and shown at game-start?
config.lootgames.gol.max_attempts.toolti: How many attempts does a player have? The structure will fail after max attempt count is passed, or the player will win if he beat at least 1 stage.
At which stage should the playfield become a full 3x3 pattern? Set 0 to disable and keep the 4-block size; set 1 to always start with 3x3.
config.lootgames.gol.on_fail_explode.too: Enable or disable struct exploding on max failed attempts.
config.lootgames.gol.on_fail_zombies.too: Enable or disable struct filling with zombies on max failed attempts.
config.lootgames.gol.on_fail_lava.toolti: Enable or disable struct filling with lava on max failed attempts.
config.lootgames.gol.timeout.tooltip: How long does it take to timeout a game? Value is in seconds. If player has been inactive for given time, the game will go to sleep. The next player can start the game from the beginning.
config.lootgames.gol.stage.min_rounds_re: Minimum correct rounds required to complete this stage and unlock the chest. This can be adjusted per-Dimension in Per-Dimension Config.
config.lootgames.gol.stage.randomize.too: If true, the pattern will randomize on each round in this stage.
config.lootgames.gol.stage.display_time:
Display Time
config.lootgames.gol.stage.display_time.tooltip=The amount of time (in ticks, 20 ticks = 1s) the symbol will be displayed.
config.lootgames.gol.stage.dimconfig.too:
Here you can add different loottables to each dimension. If dimension isn't in this list, then game will take default loottable for this stage.
Syntax: <dimension_id>; <loottable_name>; <min_rounds_required_to_pass>
<loottable_name> - The loottable name for the chest in this stage. Can be skipped. In this case you just need to write semicolon, example: "{0; ; 10}" 
<min_rounds_required_to_pass> - Minimum correct rounds required to complete this stage and unlock the chest. Can be skipped. Example with skipping: "{0; minecraft:chests/simple_dungeon; }" 
"General Example: { 0; minecraft:chests/simple_dungeon; 10 }
config.lootgames.ms.board_size.tooltip: The size of Minesweeper board. Accepts only odd numbers. If you set this to even number, then it will be increased by one.
config.lootgames.ms.bomb_count.tooltip: The amount of bombs on the board.
config.lootgames.ms.detonation_time.tool: The time until bombs start to explode. Represented in ticks.
config.lootgames.ms.attempt_count.toolti: It represents the number of attempts the player has to beat the game successfully.
config.lootgames.ms.stage.dimconfig.tool:
Here you can add different loottables to each dimension. If dimension isn't in this list, then game will take default loottable for this stage.
Syntax: <dimension_id>; <loottable_name>
<loottable_name> - The loottable name for the chest in this stage.
General Example: { 0; minecraft:chests/simple_dungeon }
command.lootgames.help.usage: /lootgames help - Prints available commands with their usage
command.lootgames.main.usage: Use "/lootgames help" to see available commands.
command.lootgames.profile.usage: Use "/lootgames profile" to see profiling results (only for dev use).
